attributes.action: Enforce Local Authorities to ensure all road signs are visible for at least a hundred yards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many road signs can become obscured by trees, bushes or objects with the result that the motorist/ driver is on to a junction or other hazard too late to make the necesary action, whether it is turning/ changing lanes or some other action.
The matter of trees and bushes is particularly important in summer months when in leaf.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
